selectedVerses.text: They lift it to their shoulders, they carry it, they set it in its place, and it stands there; it cannot move from its place. If one cries to it, it does not answer or save him from his trouble.
From out of the city the dying groan, and the soul of the wounded cries for help; yet God charges no one with wrong.
A voice cries: "In the wilderness prepare the way of the LORD; make straight in the desert a highway for our God.
beside the gates in front of the town, at the entrance of the portals she cries aloud:
The LORD goes out like a mighty man, like a man of war he stirs up his zeal; he cries out, he shouts aloud, he shows himself mighty against his foes.
